# TSP задача коммивояжера {#sec-r-tools-solver-evolutionary-tsp}

```{r}
data('USCA50', package = 'TSP')
methods <- c('nearest_insertion', 'farthest_insertion', 'cheapest_insertion', 'arbitrary_insertion', 'nn', 'repetitive_nn', 'two_opt')
tours <- sapply(methods, \(m) TSP::solve_TSP(USCA50, method = m), simplify = FALSE)
```
